channel.title: Client (error_game_crash)
channel.description: hello i've downloaded nrs3server V4 and i have a problem. i can run the cache fine and the client but after the client loaded 100% it come up a black screen and it wont come up the page of the client. on my cmd client run it say error_game_crash??? :confused: my cache and my scoure is running 732 and my cache is 732. i use matrix client 718 can somene plisssss help me of this problem but i think it's the client opcodes not the cache opcodes so i say again can somene plzzz help me? and tell me where the opcodes must be thank you :rolleyes: if you want the scoure i've downloaded it's here: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,586200.0.html here is the client i use: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,553553.msg4055577.html#msg4055577 (i used only the client not the scoure on that link) and the last cache i use: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,556276.msg4072100.html#msg4072100 (i use the 732 cache).

item.title: Client (error_game_crash)
item.dc:creator: @mercury13 mercury13
item.description:
@mercury13 wrote:

hello i’ve downloaded nrs3server V4 and i have a problem.
i can run the cache fine and the client but after the client loaded 100% it come up a black screen and it wont come up the page of the client.
on my cmd client run it say error_game_crash??? my cache and my scoure is running 732 and my cache is 732.
i use matrix client 718 can somene plisssss help me of this problem but i think it’s the client opcodes not the cache opcodes so i say again can somene plzzz help me?
and tell me where the opcodes must be thank you :rolleyes:
if you want the scoure i’ve downloaded it’s here: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,586200.0.html
here is the client i use: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,553553.msg4055577.html#msg4055577 (i used only the client not the scoure on that link)
and the last cache i use: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,556276.msg4072100.html#msg4072100 (i use the 732 cache).

Read full topic
